      • startRecognition

        public void startRecognition(java.io.InputStream stream,
                    TimeFrame timeFrame)
        Starts recognition process. Starts recognition process and optionally clears previous data.
        Parameters:
        stream - input stream to process
        timeFrame - time range of the stream to process
        See Also:
        stopRecognition()

      • stopRecognition

        public void stopRecognition()
        Stops recognition process. Recognition process is paused until the next call to startRecognition.
        See Also:
        startRecognition(InputStream, TimeFrame)
